Description: Horizontal panel with a triumphal arch with three passageways. The arched central passageway topped with a pediment with a crowned escutcheon. At left and right, square pavilions connected to the central arch by lower passageways. On top of each pavilion, an obelisks decorated with armorial trophies and topped with flaming balls. From a group of four prints belonging to a series of six plates with designs for triumphal arches and city gates.
Provenance: Vendor: P. & D. Colnaghi & Co., Ltd., London
